name: Sal
title: Minced and Moist - fine dinning version
content: So you have to eat a minced and moist diet because of dry mouth after radiation? This is for you:||Creamy Dill Salmon

name: Lernantino
title: thickening liquids - that taste okay
content: If you have to drink mildly thick liquids, you know it doesn't taste good in water. Here are some ideas to stay hydrated with taste!

name: Amiko
title: Recipe for inpaired chewing!
content: Can't chew because of a tongue resection? Don't worry yout can still be part of the fun with this recipie!
